Lines starting with # are only comments for humans

[PROMPT]Improve the quality of the following content by proofreading, adding the most relevant information, and keeping it reading level of 5th grade with a first-person tone of voice. Avoid writing generic words, jargon words and generic keyphrases. Must have contractions in writing.[TARGETLANGUAGE]
